name: react-ts-todo
description: Todo applikation built in React (+ Material UI) and TypeScript for frontend, TypeScript (Express) and Node for backend, gRPC for RPC requests and MariaDB as database (but will be migrated over to Postgress later in the project).

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
